Cleric.name: Smite
Cleric.description: Unleashes a divine strike against an enemy.

Cleric.name: Holy Spear
Cleric.description: Casts a spear of holy energy towards a single enemy

Cleric.name: Shielf of Faith
Cleric.description: Increases personal defense by 30% for 3 turns

Cleric.name: Celestial Blast
Cleric.description: Unleashes a burst of divine energy on a single target

Cleric.name: Guardian's Ward
Cleric.description: Increases personal defense by 40% for 3 turns.

Druid.name: Thorn Whip
Druid.description: Summons thorny vines to strike a single target.

Druid.name: Barkskin
Druid.description: Increases personal defense by 20% for 2 turns

Druid.name: Entangling Vines
Druid.description: Wraps vines around the enemy, dealing damage and bleeding for 2 turns

Druid.name: Ironwood Skin
Druid.description: Increases personal defense by 30% for 3 turns

Druid.name: Photosynthesis
Druid.description: Absorbs light and nature's energy for healing

Druid.name: Mighty Oak
Druid.description: Increases personal defense by 50% for 3 turns.

Druid.name: Gaea's Embrace
Druid.description: Invokes the life force of the earth for rejuvenation.

Mage.name: Firebolt
Mage.description: Cast a bolt of fire at a single target

Mage.name: Mage Armor
Mage.description: Increases personal defense by 20% for 2 turns

Mage.name: Ice Shard
Mage.description: Hurls a shard of ice at an enemy

Mage.name: Mirror Image
Mage.description: Creates multiple copies of the mage, making it harder for enemies to target the real mage

Mage.name: Mana Infusion
Mage.description: Siphons ambient mana for a quick replenishment.

Mage.name: Chain Lightning
Mage.description: Releases a bolt of lightning that arcs between multiple enemies.

Mage.name: Empowerment
Mage.description: Enhances the mage's next spell cast for added potency

Monk.name: Fist of Fury
Monk.description: Unleashes a powerful strike on a single target

Monk.name: Whirlwind Strike
Monk.description: Performs a swift spinning strike, damaging multiple foes

Monk.name: Evasion
Monk.description: Utilizes agility to dodge incoming attacks

Monk.name: Empowered Strikes
Monk.description: Channels ki into strikes for increased damage.

Monk.name: Five Elements Palm
Monk.description: Strikes an enemy's pressure points to deal massive damage.

Monk.name: Harmony Aura
Monk.description: Projects a calming aura to heal allies

Paladin.name: Righteous Strike
Paladin.description: Delivers a holy-infused melee attack on a single target

Paladin.name: Lay on Hands
Paladin.description: Calls upon divine healing power to restore health

Paladin.name: Holy Smite
Paladin.description: Unleashes a wave of holy energy to damage multiple foes.

Paladin.name: Shield of Faith
Paladin.description: Strengthen armor with divine faith, boosting defense

Paladin.name: Divine Justice
Paladin.description: Empowers the Paladin's strikes with holy might.

Paladin.name: Sacred Wrath
Paladin.description: Focuses divine fury to deal heavy damage to a single target.

Paladin.name: Blessed Renewal
Paladin.description: Calls upon divine blessings to restore the health

Rogue.name: Backstab
Rogue.description: Enables a swift, sneaky attack against a single target

Rogue.name: Poisoned Blades
Rogue.description: Coats weapons with a deadly poison, increasing damage.

Rogue.name: Trickster Gambit
Rogue.description: Duplicates the Rogue's image, creating confusion among enemies.

Rogue.name: Assassinate
Rogue.description: Delivers a lethal, precision strike on a single enemy.

Warlock.name: Eldritch Bolt
Warlock.description: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy at a single target.

Warlock.name: Life Tap
Warlock.description: Siphons life energy to restore the Warlock's health.

Warlock.name: Curse of Agony
Warlock.description: Inflicts lingering pain on a single target

Warlock.name: Drain Life
Warlock.description: Channels life force from an enemy to heal the Warlock.

Warrior.name: Cleave
Warrior.description: Executes a sweeping attack that damages multiple adjacent enemies.

Warrior.name: Whirlwind
Warrior.description: Spins around, hitting all adjacent enemies with a powerful strike.

Warrior.name: Second Wind
Warrior.description: Draws upon inner strength to heal wounds.

Warrior.name: Warrior's Fury
Warrior.description: Unleashes a burst of fury, increasing the Warrior's attack power.

Warrior.name: Shield Wall
Warrior.description: Blocks a significant amount of damage for 2 turns.
